name: Latide's Plane (ApeHardware)
description:
An old project I managed to recover and rework a bit.

Some aliens/creatures/whatever have stolen your body. And they turned you into some sort of jelly cube. And they have taken you to their homeworld/dimension/plane of existence. And they are using you for profit.

Not your best day, huh?

But don't worry, your service robot is here to save the day!

And beat up everyone.

  • Punch lots of weird monsters!
  • A high score system + replay challenges to keep your find satisfied with family-friendly violence.
  • A store with dumb powerups.
  • Tired of punching? Try the mines or the special plasma attack.
  • Some sort of plot.
  • Why did I made this again?
